mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_accounthead( id, type, organ_id, hands_person_id, change_amount, total_price, account_id, bill_no, bill_time, remark, delete_flag ) VALUES (#{id}, #{type}, #{organId}, #{handsPersonId}, #{changeAmount}, #{totalPrice}, #{accountId}, #{billNo}, #{operTime}, #{remark}, #{deleteFlag})

INSERT INTO erp_accountitem( id, header_id, account_id, each_amount, remark, delete_flag ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.headerId}, #{item.accountId}, #{item.eachAmount}, #{item.remark}, #{item.deleteFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.type payType, a.organ_id organId, a.hands_person_id handsPersonId, CONVERT(a.change_amount, decimal(24, 2)) changeAmount, CONVERT(a.total_price, decimal(24, 2)) totalPrice, a.bill_no billNo, CONVERT (a.bill_time, char) billTime, a.remark FROM erp_accounthead a WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.delete_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.bill_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.account_id accountId, CONVERT(a.each_amount , decimal(24, 2)) initemMoney, a.remark FROM erp_accountitem a WHERE a.header_id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, FORMAT(a.change_amount, 2) changeAmount, FORMAT(a.total_price, 2) totalPrice, a.bill_no billNo, CONVERT (a.bill_time, CHAR) operTime, a.remark, s.supplier supplierName, group_concat(distinct b.user_name) hansPersonName FROM erp_accounthead a LEFT JOIN erp_supplier s ON a.organ_id = s.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.hands_person_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.user_id, ',')) WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.bill_time DESC

SELECT a.id, FORMAT(a.each_amount, 2) eachAmount, a.remark, t.`name` accountName FROM erp_accountitem a LEFT JOIN erp_account t ON a.account_id = t.id WHERE a.header_id = #{id} AND a.delete_flag = '0'

SELECT a.id, a.change_amount changeAmount, FORMAT(a.total_price, 2) totalPrice, a.bill_no billNo, CONVERT (a.bill_time, CHAR) billTime, (SELECT group_concat(distinct m.user_name) FROM sys_eve_user_staff m WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.hands_person_id, ','), CONCAT(',', m.user_id, ','))) hansPersonName, a.remark, s.supplier supplierName FROM erp_accounthead a LEFT JOIN erp_supplier s ON a.organ_id = s.id WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' AND a.type = #{type}
AND a.bill_no LIKE '%${billNo}%'
AND a.bill_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= a.bill_time
ORDER BY a.bill_time DESC, a.id ASC
